backend/main.mo: Canister storing petition signatures with methods to create signatures and query list or count.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping report documenting implemented petition features and associated frontend components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human‑written summaries of major frontend files for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable theme definitions for an editorial high‑contrast design.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Minimal wrapper component rendering the PetitionPage.
frontend/src/components/PetitionLetter.t: Component rendering the full static petition letter with headings, paragraphs, and external link.
frontend/src/components/RecentSignatures: Displays a scrollable list of recent signatures with timestamps using React Query data.
frontend/src/components/SignatureCount.t: Card component showing the total signature count with live backend updates.
frontend/src/components/SignatureForm.ts: Signature submission form with validation, success messaging, and backend mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the authenticated or anonymous backend actor with React Query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity login, managing identity state, login flow, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/usePetitionSignatures: Hooks for fetching signature counts, listing recent signatures, and creating new signatures via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and global typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/PetitionPage.tsx: Renders the petition page layout including banner, petition letter, signature form, counts, and recent signatures.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project requirements, existing features, and pending feature requests for the petition app.
